title: Service disruption on the North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train svcs from #AngMoKio to #RafflesPlace are running normally now.
[NSL Update]: Due to maintenance work, trains are travelling slower near #RafflesPlace. Please add 10mins additional train travel time from #AngMoKio to #Raffles Place before 10am on Wed, 14 Feb.
[NSL]: Due to maintenance work, south-bound trains are travelling slower near #RafflesPlace. Please add 20mins additional train travel time from #AngMoKio to #RafflesPlace before 10am on Wed, 14 Feb.
